testcase.purpose: Check if the mutation event types must never be dispatched in a shadow DOM subtree

testcase.purpose: Check if the implementation of Retargeting algorithm is valid

testcase.purpose: Check if each shadow root has an associated list of zero or more style sheets which is named shadow root style sheets

testcase.purpose: Check if the styles of the insertion point nodes are inherited by those child nodes of the shadow host that are assigned to this insertion point

testcase.purpose: Check if the styles of the shadow insertion point node are inherited by the child nodes of the shadow root of the shadow tree which is distributed to this shadow insertion point

testcase.purpose: Check if the reset-style-inheritance flag is set for a shadow tree, all inheritable CSS properties must behave as if they were explicitly set to the initial value at the upper boundary of the tree

testcase.purpose: Check if the selection, returned by the window.getSelection() method must never return a selection within a shadow tree

testcase.purpose: Check if document's activeElement property must be adjusted

testcase.purpose: Check if shadow trees must not be propagated contentEditable attribute from shadow host

testcase.purpose: Check if the navigation order within a shadow tree must be computed as a list of focusable elements in tree order as-rendered with the exception of any elements

testcase.purpose: Check if for sequential focus navigation, the shadow DOM navigation order sequence must be inserted into the document navigation order in place of the shadow host as if the shadow host were assigned the value of auto for determining its position and shadow host is not focusable

testcase.purpose: Check if the navigation order within a shadow tree must be computed as a list of focusable elements in tree order

testcase.purpose: Check if for sequential focus navigation, the shadow DOM navigation order sequence must be inserted into the document navigation order immediately after the shadow host, if the shadow host is focusable

testcase.purpose: Check if throw an InvalidNodeTypeError, if context object is not a ShadowRoot instance
